title: tired of entitled support mains :/
body:
ur not entitled to that cannon minion just because u have relic shield. please don't complain that i took the cannon minion while u went to go ward "real quick" bc u took so long. i don't have 5 seconds to wait for u, and if it was so important u wouldn't have wasted time warding when it was right in front of u.

i'm stuck in elo hell with all of these toxic supports.
